title: Philadelphia is first major U.S. city to restore indoor mask mandate as COVID cases rise
desc:
Confirmed COVID-19 cases have risen more than 50% in 10 days, the threshold 
at which the city's guidelines call for people to wear masks indoors.

title: Miami rent is rising faster than in any other U.S. city
desc:
According to a recent report by Zumper, Miami is the U.S. city with the 
fastest rising rent prices—more than NYC or L.A..

title: The 10 U.S. Cities Where Rent Prices Are Rising Fastest
desc:
A new study from Realtor.com shows median rent is up 17% in U.S. cities, 
and Miami, Tampa and Orlando are seeing the biggest rent increases.

title: Rent prices keep rising—here are the 25 most expensive U.S. cities to rent a 1-bedroom apartment
desc:
The prices for one-bedroom rentals in the U.S. have risen for the second 
straight month, for a new all-time median high of $1393, according to a new 
study.
